metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13286 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function JBIG2Stream::readTextRegionSeg() located at JBIG2Stream.cc. It can, for example, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool. It might allow an attacker to cause Information Disclosure.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> poppler has extra checks, reproducer didn't work ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore.

criterions.comment: poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu4').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
